*Name:* mzIdLib:Threshold<br>
*Description:*<br>
Using mzIdentML-Lib to remove identification under given threshold<br>
*Input files:*
  * input   Input file 
*Parameters:*<br>
  * isPSMThreshold    
  * Conditional element: score
    * post
    * engine

  * threshValue    
  * thresholdBetterScoresAreLower    
*Outputs:*<br>
  * output with Type mzid
*Details:*<br>
	Threshold can be used with any search engine or post-processing score that a user may with to apply the threshold over. Usually this tool is used after FDR calculation and can be a precursor to ProteoGrouper.
	<br>
